channel.title: Need extremly help! rep++
channel.description:
Gosh! i have tryed sooo many times but i still get errors :S im trying to use eclipse to run Project Annihilation, but i getting errors... this is what i do: [code]Open Eclipse>new>java Project>adding the server to eclipse>Right click runefocus>new>run as>run configurations>new java application>main class>seacrh>clicking: Server - .com.rs2 after clicked seacrh>arguments>VM arguments> writing -Xmx515m>going back to the start>referenced libaries>build path>configure build path>removing all "xpp3" and "xstream" with the [X]>Add external jars>clicking "Xpp3" and "Xstream">clicking "ok">going back to the new configuration>clicking "run" and in the "console" it says this:[/code] [code]Usage: Server <host> <port> <cycleRate> [/code]
Here you maybe see it some better? :
Open Eclipse>new>java Project>adding the server to eclipse>Right click runefocus>new>run as>run configurations>new java application>main class>seacrh>clicking: Server - .com.rs2 after clicked seacrh>arguments>VM arguments> writing -Xmx515m>going back to the start>referenced libaries>build path>configure build path>removing all "xpp3" and "xstream" with the [X]>Add external jars>clicking "Xpp3" and "Xstream">clicking "ok">going back to the new configuration>clicking "run" and in the "console" it says this:
Usage: Server <host> <port> <cycleRate>
[size=12pt]if you know what i do wrong, and can help me. I will rep++ you, and when im done with the server, i will set the credits on you as 45& ;)[/size]
Example:
[code]Credits (TinyscapeII) (your name) 45% Nox 55% [/code]
Hope you will help me :)
[size=36pt]THANK YOU :)[/size]

item.title: Need extremly help! rep++
item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx
item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

Gosh! i have tryed sooo many times but i still get errors :S im trying to use eclipse to run Project Annihilation, but i getting errors… this is what i do: Open Eclipse>new>java Project>adding the server to eclipse>Right click runefocus>new>run as>run configurations>new java application>main class>seacrh>clicking: Server - .com.rs2 after clicked seacrh>arguments>VM arguments> writing -Xmx515m>going back to the start>referenced libaries>build path>configure build path>removing all "xpp3" and "xstream" with the [X]>Add external jars>clicking "Xpp3" and "Xstream">clicking "ok">going back to the new configuration>clicking "run" and in the "console" it says this: Usage: Server <host> <port> <cycleRate>

Here you maybe see it some better? :

Open Eclipse>new>java Project>adding the server to eclipse>Right click runefocus>new>run as>run configurations>new java application>main class>seacrh>clicking: Server - .com.rs2 after clicked seacrh>arguments>VM arguments> writing -Xmx515m>going back to the start>referenced libaries>build path>configure build path>removing all “xpp3” and “xstream” with the [X]>Add external jars>clicking “Xpp3” and “Xstream”>clicking “ok”>going back to the new configuration>clicking “run” and in the “console” it says this:

Usage: Server

[size=12pt]if you know what i do wrong, and can help me. I will rep++ you, and when im done with the server, i will set the credits on you as 45& ;)[/size]

Example:

Credits (TinyscapeII) (your name) 45% Nox 55%

Hope you will help me

[size=36pt]THANK YOU :)[/size]
